com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport

Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.CoreItem
      • com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.Item
        • com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.Link

  • public final class Link
extends Item
    A kind of Item that represents a relationship between two real-world objects.

    Compared with Items, links include references to the two Entitys they connect, plus information about the link itself: its direction and its strength.

    As Items, links can contain Cards, but in practice it is often better to use an Entity to model the details of an association.

    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • Link

        public Link(ItemIdentifierAndVersion itemIdentifierAndVersion,
            SecurityAccessLevel accessLevel,
            SecurityGrantLevel grantLevel,
            String itemTypeId,
            PropertyValue createdTimestamp,
            PropertyValue modifiedTimestamp,
            Collection<Card> cards,
            ItemIdentifier fromEntityItemIdentifier,
            ItemIdentifier toEntityItemIdentifier,
            LinkDirection linkDirection,
            String linkStrengthId,
            Collection<PrimaryPropertyIdentifier> primaryPropertyIdentifiers)
        Constructs a new Link by initializing all mandatory fields.
        Parameters:
        itemIdentifierAndVersion - The ItemIdentifierAndVersion of the new Link.
        accessLevel - The SecurityAccessLevel that the current user has for this Link.
        grantLevel - The SecurityGrantLevel that the current user has for this Link.
        itemTypeId - A String containing the identifier of the new Link's ItemType.
        createdTimestamp - A PropertyValue containing the time when the Link was created.
        modifiedTimestamp - A PropertyValue containing the time when the Link was last modified.
        cards - The Cards to be stored with the new Link.
        fromEntityItemIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Entity at the "from" end of the new Link.
        toEntityItemIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Entity at the "to" end of the new Link.
        linkDirection - The LinkDirection of the new Link.
        linkStrengthId - A String containing the identifier of the new Link's LinkStrength.
        primaryPropertyIdentifiers - The PrimaryPropertyIdentifiers of the primary properties for this Link.
